column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: ------All religious gatherings have been ordered to cease with immediate effective in order to fight Covid-19
column4: according to an announcement from the Ministry of Health to the Ministry of Cults and Religion
column5: dated 17 March 2020------The decision was made after Cambodia saw a 100% increase of cases of Covid-19 overnight
column6: from 12 to 24 cases confirmed.------This comes after all schools were closed on Monday and KTVs
column7: cinemas and museums ordered to shut on Tuesday.
